trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about a method across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Definerer en kontrakt komponenter kan bruke til å få tilgang til informasjon om en metode på tvers av programmet domenet og behandle grenser.

trans-unit.source: An IRemoteMethodInfoContract represents a method of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: En IRemoteMethodInfoContract representerer en metode for et eksternt objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>grensesnittet.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract>

trans-unit.source: To access one or more methods of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til én eller flere metoder for et eksternt objekt, kan du bruke den <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>metode for å få en <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract>som representerer typen for det eksterne objektet.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the method that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer informasjon om metoden som denne <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> </xref> identifiserer.

trans-unit.source: The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMethodData> structure includes the types of the method's return value and parameters.
trans-unit.target: Informasjonen fra den <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMethodData>strukturen inneholder typer metoden returverdien og parametere.</xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMethodData>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMethodData"></xref> that provides information about the method that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> identifies.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMethodData"> </xref> som inneholder informasjon om metoden som denne <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"> </xref> identifiserer.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the method that this <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract"></xref> identifies.

If the invoked method does not have a return value (for example, the method is a constructor), Invoke returns a default <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument> in which the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A> property is set to the value <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A> property is set to the value <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis metoden ikke har en returverdi (for eksempel metoden er en konstruktør), Invoke Returnerer standard <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>der <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A>egenskapen er satt til verdi <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A>egenskapen er satt til verdien <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.TypeCode%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgumentKind?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument.RemoteArgumentKind%2A> </xref:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"></xref> that identifies the object that contains the method to invoke.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract"> </xref> som identifiserer objektet som inneholder metoden som skal startes.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> values that specifies how to invoke the method.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"> </xref> verdier som angir hvordan å aktivere metoden.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"></xref> that specifies the method parameters; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the method does not have any parameters.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayContract"> </xref> som angir metodeparameterne; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hvis metoden ikke har ingen parametere.

trans-unit.source: The locale ID that the method will use for any locale-specific type conversions of the arguments or return value.
trans-unit.target: IDen for nasjonal innstilling som bruker metoden for en hvilken som helst brukerinnstillingene datatyper av argumentene eller returverdi.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"></xref> that specifies the return value of the invoked method.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument"> </xref> som angir verdien som returneres av metoden.
